SEARCH.TITLE: Search
SEARCH.IGNORED_PARAMETERS: The result contains objects which may not fit all given search criterias
SEARCH.QUERY_NO_RESULT: No results for this search query.
SEARCH.AUTHOR: Author

NODE_STORE.TITLE: Bookmarks
NODE_STORE.REMOVED_ITEMS: {{count}} Element(s) have been removed from bookmarks

SEARCH.NO_SAVED_SEARCH: No searches have been saved yet.

SAVE_SEARCH.TITLE: save search
SAVE_SEARCH.DESCRIPTION: Your current search criteria are saved in a file. When you open this file, you can restore the current search query. The results of the current search are not saved and will change with new / deleted objects.
SAVE_SEARCH.NAME: description
SAVE_SEARCH.SEARCH_EXISTS_TITLE: A search with the same criteria has already been saved.
SAVE_SEARCH.SEARCH_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A saved search query with the same name already exists. If you continue, the existing query will be replaced with the current settings.
SAVE_SEARCH.TOAST_SAVED: The current search query has been saved successfully.
